PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08302020-10-23,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC, 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Modifying the Operation of the Passenger Automobile and Light Truck Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations
PrecisOrder approving the INTERIM ORDER MODIFYING THE OPERATION OF THE PASSENGER AUTOMOBILE AND LIGHT TRUCK GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSION REGULATIONS, made by the Minister of the Environment on October 13, 2020 in order to correct the multiplier formula used to determine carbon dioxide (CO2) equivalent emission credits for advanced technology vehicles.
AttachmentsAttachment
